title: (x) italic with old school 'd' - Cochin Italic {Marc O}
content:
A friend of mine needs this IDed. So many scripts these days, so little time. Sorry the sample's so skanky -- I swear I'm not the one who saved as a JPEG ;-) Thanks.   
   
[Stupid image attachment]
author: matteson

comments.content:
I believe we're looking at Cochin Italic.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/cochin/italic/testdrive.html?s=Residential&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416181228/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/cochin/italic/testdrive.html?s=Residential&p=48)
Awesome. Thanks Marc. Now I feel like a subhuman for calling it a 'script'. Ah well.
